creditline: Gift of the Clark Center for Japanese Art & Culture; formerly given to the Center by Audrey Seo and Stephen Addiss
description: letter in two different styles; first portion at R written in closely spaced cursive, with some lines running at a very slight angle; the last few lines are written in very neat, carefully spaced Chinese characters, with the last two lines becoming more expressive and curvilinear; mounted on light yellow/tan with gold flecks
markings: on back, bottom center, in pencil: [Tetto]
title: Letter to Takeshita sensei
